InstaSize: Photo Editing & Filters

Brief: InstaSize is the go-to app to swiftly add a creative touch to your images with professional filter effects and text overlays. It provides a suite of powerful editing tools, allowing users to personalize their photos with a variety of fonts, frames, and background patterns.
